message.content: {"given_definition_quality":60,"better_definition":"Chinese character used in writing Chinese.","sentence":"我会写汉字。","image_prompt":"A child sitting at a simple desk, writing a single large Chinese character (汉字) on a piece of paper with focus and care. The room is soft-lit, with gentle light coming in from the window, and the atmosphere has scattered, subtle hints of a soft apocalypse: quiet, empty city landscape visible outside, with vines creeping on the window. Animation style is gentle, pastel, and slightly surreal, but not threatening.","sentence_translation":"I can write Chinese characters."}
